alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ascension, northeastern St. James, central Livingston and central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greenwell Spring to Walker to 6 miles north of Whitehall. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Oak Hills Place, Walker, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Merrydale, Inniswold, Watson, Prairieville, Pride, Shenandoah, Greenwell Spring, Whitehall and Village St. George. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 160 and 172, and between mile markers 188 and 196. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension
